siyalu radawiyanta thunwela kama labadenu labana namuth laba dena aahara niyamitha pramithiyen ha prasamanawalin menma poshana gunayenda thoraya.aahara pisina wita adangu kala yuthu kalamana nisi ayurin noyedima hethuwen ema aahara wala kisidu rasayak nodanena athara udaharanayak lesa minisunta anubawa kala nohaki lesa bathala manynyokka wani da hodi hada aaharayata dena awastha atha.sirakaru aahara wattoruwa nisi lesa mudal prathipadana bandanagara departhumenthuwata rajayen wen wana namudu bandanagarayata arakgath tendar mafiyawa ha niladaringe gasa kam nisa sirakaruwa athata pathwana aahara patha wathurayi bathuyi thathwayata pathwa atha.awasanaye sirakaruwantath siduwa aththe bandanagara muluthan geyi niladarinta ho ehi wadawala niyuthu sirakaruwan ta ayatha lesa mudal laba di thamage aahara welata awashya kalamana (thunapaha,miris,pol)labagena bandanagarayen pisa labadena aahara welata awshya kalamana ekathukota nawatha hora rahase pisa ganimatayi.mudal hadal athi athalossak sirakaruwan ema karyaye niratha wana athara owun dinakata ekawelak ho bandanaggaraya pisa labadena aahara wela sirakaruwan kihipa denek ekathuwi elawalu ha bath wena wenama labagena ewa awashya kalamana ek kota nawatha pisa aaharayata gani.podu we boho hirakaruwn dena deyak ka nihadawa siti.aahara gana masiwili nagana ha ee sambandawa nirantharayen prashna karana sirakaruwanta thadana pidanayen ha wenath bandanagara walata maru kara hiriharayata lak kirimen prashnaya magaharimata bandanagara niladarin katayuthu karayi.
